charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Rose in town
with Copperajah.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_0200_1:
Hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
What a coincidence seeing you here. Are you out
shopping, too?
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_0300_1:
Copperajah and I were just transporting all the
things I bought.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_0400_1: I’d be happy to help carry yours too, if you like!
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_0500_1:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I haven’t
introduced you yet, have I?
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_0600_1:
Allow me to formally introduce you to Copperajah,
my partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_0700_1:
Copperajah is a Pokémon that’s well-known in the
Galar region.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_0800_1:
They’ve been working with humans since
old times...
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_0900_1:
But according to one theory, Copperajah came to
Galar from a different region long ago.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_1000_1:
People and Pokémon living together and supporting
each other for years... It’s a wonderful thing,
wouldn’t you say?
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_0401_1200_1:
I like how straightforward you are! I’d like to teach
you more.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_1500_1:
Copperajah has always had a special connection
to both me and Galar.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_1600_1:
When I was younger, I remember my little
brother and I caught a Cufant, the Pokémon
Copperajah evolves from.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_0401_1800_1: What’s he like? Hmm, let me think...
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_2100_1:
He once became the Galar Champion and was
named “Steel Peony”...
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_2200_1:
But we haven’t kept in touch, so I don’t know
where he is or what he’s been up to.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_2300_1:
My apologies. There are times when adults like my
brother and I just can’t seem to have an honest
discussion. Sometimes our pride gets in the way.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_2500_1:
I may not look it, but I used to be quite the Trainer
myself long ago.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_2600_1: I even came in second place in the Galar League!
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_2700_1:
Ever since I was put in charge of the business
side of the League, I haven’t had many
Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_2800_1:
But I’m on Pasio now! I might as well give it my
all while I’m here!
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_0401_3000_1: I’m delighted to hear you say that!
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_0402_3200_1: Ah, yes! Of course you’d want to battle, too!
charaepi_ch0262_00_rose/2301_1201_3300_1:
All right, then. Copperajah and I shall aim to
become the top sync pair on Pasio!
